actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the disposal of chemical-grade chromite from the national stockpile and the supplemental stockpile, in order to alleviate the critical shortage of chemical-grade chromite in the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of General Services to dispose of 241,600 short dry tons of chemical grade chromite now held in existing Federal stockpiles for chemical processing.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the disposal of chemical-grade chromite from the national stockpile and the supplemental stockpile, in order to alleviate the critical shortage of chemical-grade chromite in the United States.
